tweets.text: Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

No update from @EnvAgencyMids after capping deadline @RedIndustries2 Walleys Landfill?The stink has been horrendous over the weekend,EA  email complaint mailbox not functioning,the odour‚Äôs not been mitigated,it‚Äôs still out of control-failure on failure @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

Please listen now @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @kiergroup This COULD be a fantastic project but you need to do the work at the correct time of year and NOT during the breeding season. Thanks @ChrisGPackham for the support and fingers crossed they see sense. https://t.co/En5Y1I6Rts
@Fifty50andFab @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding It's in Devon, Fay. A VERY long way from HS2.

We‚Äôre really pleased to see people enjoying our new bridge. Funded through #DNAire thanks to @HeritageFundNOR @EnvAgencyYNE @CravenCouncil & @YorkshireWater. Soon volunteers from Saltaire AA will clearing the goit to create better habitat for trout & coarse fish. A win for all üêü https://t.co/9eEvv7DzNq

@scottdegg @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 It very much feels like @ClareDinnisEA was sent here last week against her wishes as a PR exercise in the face of national news coverage showing @EnvAgencyMids in a very bad way. The months of hiding away in an ivory tower was the easy option which it looks like she has resumed!
@ClareDinnisEA @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency https://t.co/NnneDCLPwn

More destruction of nature?@EnvAgency Birds are breeding at the Lower Otter Restoration Project! #HS2 They are supposed to be protected! @GreenJennyJones @CarolineLucas @ZacGoldsmith https://t.co/LrFVhWMohv

tweets.text: Come on @ClareDinnisEA we need answers! https://t.co/vhgFlpKbut

@Tus_M_ @ClareDinnisEA @robbiedyson @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @StaffordshireCC And why does it still stink ?  And why won‚Äôt you stop them poisoning us ?
Solutions please
It never ends does it? The relentless morale-beating that comes from living in a country with an environmental protection body as broken as the @EnvAgency https://t.co/K2Ub0hL4vc

Devastating new critique of @EnvAgency by @SalmonTroutCons: ‚ÄúAll monitored waters in England are polluted with toxic & persistent chemicals, including insecticides and herbicides. Millions of hours of untreated sewage flows are still entering our rivers‚Äù
https://t.co/89OXkhNSJV

It is. It is astonishing. But it is and @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice know it. So does @StaffordshireCC @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids Thank You @DJAndyMoor for your support and voice @StinkStopthe https://t.co/cikerfAUTU

@ClareDinnisEA @robbiedyson @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @StaffordshireCC @NewsNBC You promised an update from the deadline and weekend inspections, has this been issued yet please? I am 2 miles away and yet again experienced ghastly odours and bad breathing air over the weekend resulting in my wife having a 24 hr debilitating migraine. Will this ever end?

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids do we need to kick the bucket before you people take this seriously? Or will you let those cowboys at the landfill get away with that? #StopTheStink https://t.co/Z8JVyafX9U

This week, we‚Äôve visited #WalleysQuarry to assess @RedIndustries2 progress on the required capping works. 

We expect Red Industries to complete that work today. 

See our webpage for further updates and air quality information. https://t.co/6B9i1x2fA0

#NewcastleUnderLyme https://t.co/GengkU8LDM

Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va
@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Absolutely no relation to #HS2 but you‚Äôll shoehorn one in anyway‚Ä¶ pathetic!

This isn't just a stink, hydrogen sulphide is a lethal gas that can kill instantly at high enough concentrations. If this keeps on happening, night after night, someone is going to die. Someone needs to help Newcastle under Lyme.
This is a universal UK problem. C‚Äômon legislators and regulators enough is enough! Be brave billy boy be brave... @WGEnviroAgri @NatResWales @CommonsEAC @EnvAgency https://t.co/Yf5fHOwd0m

@AlexiaRFishwick @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Hard to say? But surely if it‚Äôs illegal then just don‚Äôt do it! Sending completely the wrong message to others. What a mad world.
I‚Äôm pleased to present @EnvAgency with this award for their regulation of Walleys Landfill #StopTheStink https://t.co/WAVIJNUwyT
@EllieChowns @EnvAgency Sadly it is possible the farmer in question is blissfully unaware. Education is a major problem where eutrophication is concerned.

@TonyJuniper @pow_rebecca @EmmaHowardBoyd please don‚Äôt allow the Lower Otter Project to become another example of awful habitat destruction - another laughing stock. Really, where is @NaturalEngland  &  @EnvAgency these days, and their leadership? Delay until after nesting! https://t.co/UIFWOQoE7N
